Obupani Slovenec: zredila se je za 100 kg, ponižuje ga in zmerja
Na spletu je prosil za nasvet, saj ne ve več, kaj naj stori.
01 Nov 2019, 12:35 by P. K.
Na enem od slovenskih pogovornih forumov se je pojavil zapis obupanca. Njegova partnerica se je po porodu popolnoma spremenila, fizično in psihično. Zredila se je za 100 kilogramov, kar resno ogroža njeno zdravje. S partnerico sta se v preteklosti zelo dobro razumela, sedaj pa je menda postala nesramna in ga ponižuje. »Če se je toliko zredila, sta dve možnosti. Ali je v hudi depresiji ali pa so ji popolnoma podivjali hormoni,« je situacijo komentiral eden od uporabnikov. Mnogi moškemu svetujejo, naj se z njo odkrito pogovori in ji ponudi strokovno pomoč. Ena izmed komentatork je celo priznala, da ima sam podobne težave in da se je zaradi čustvenih težav zredila za nekaj deset kilogramov. »Če ti ni vseeno, poskusi z odkritim, sočutnim pogovorom. Mene so v otroštvu velikokrat prizadeli in težko dojemam, da mi mož noče nič slabega, da ni moj sovražnik. Ko se človek tako zelo zredi, je to jasen znak, da se tako zelo ne mara, da mu je popolnoma vseeno za videz in zdravje, zagrenjenost pa seveda prizadeva tudi tebe in otroka.«

Desperate Slovenian: She gained 100 kg, humiliates him and always does
He asked for advice online, as he no longer knew what to do.
01 Nov 2019, 12:35 by P.K.
At one of the Slovenian discussion forums, a note from a defendant appeared. His partner changed completely after birth, both physically and mentally. She gained 100 pounds, which is a serious threat to her health. He and his partner have gotten along very well in the past, but now he seems to be rude and humiliated. “If she has gained so much, there are two options. Is she severely depressed or completely hormone-stricken, ”commented one of the users. Many advise men to talk to her openly and offer her professional help. One commenter even admitted that she had similar problems and that she gained over ten pounds due to emotional problems. “If you don't care, try a frank, compassionate conversation. I have been hurt many times in my childhood and I have a hard time understanding that my husband wants nothing bad, that he is not my enemy. When a person is so very mature, it is a clear sign that he does not care so much that he completely does not care about appearance and health, and zeal naturally affects you and the baby. "
